archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: SIAMED Dashboard for NCAs (H+V)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: The National Competent Authorities can benefit from having access to procedure data from the European Agency's product data base SIAMED.The data comes from the Agency's centrally maintained procedure management tracking database: SIAMED. The data is uploaded frequently, so there is only a delay of up to Â½ hour between updates in the SIAMED database and being available in the Dashboard.
